sentences.en: A bevy of bathing beauties appeared on the beach.
sentences.cn: 沙滩上出现了一群游泳的美女.

sentences.en: A bevy of girls were picking tea on the hillside.
sentences.cn: 一群姑娘正在山坡上采茶.

sentences.en: A bevy of quails lit in the tress near our house.
sentences.cn: 一群鹌鹑停落在我家附近的树上.

sentences.en: A bevy of young beach boys swarmed around him.
sentences.cn: 一群海滩上的男孩围住了他.

sentences.en: Bevy and I understand each other perfectly.
sentences.cn: 白妃和我彼此非常了解.

sentences.en: Bevy, I'm really curious as to this sudden decision of yours.
sentences.cn: 白妃, 我对你这样突如其来的决定,的确感到奇怪.

sentences.en: Currently, dentists have a bevy of indirect restorative materials at their disposal.
sentences.cn: 通常牙医会有几种间接修复材料可以选择.

sentences.en: He was surrounded by a bevy of beauties in bathing attire.
sentences.cn: 他被一群泳装美女包围着.

sentences.en: He was surrounded by a bevy of beautiful girls.
sentences.cn: 他被一大群漂亮姑娘围了起来.

sentences.en: I was so driven , Bevy, I didn't know which way to turn.
sentences.cn: 我真是迫不得已呀,白菲, 我不知道走哪条路好了.

sentences.en: Remember, Bevy is a very brilliant and resourceful girl.
sentences.cn: 记住, 白妃是个非常聪明而有才干的姑娘.

sentences.en: The young man lit a cigar, and followed the bevy of maidens slowly up the road.
sentences.cn: 这位年青人点燃了一支雪茄, 跟在这群少女后面,慢吞吞地走到路上.

sentences.en: There are a whole bevy of reasons for this.
There came a bevy of youths and maidens.
sentences.cn: 看那边来了一群男女青年.

sentences.en: We were visited at breakfast by a bevy of excited ducks.
sentences.cn: 我们吃早餐的时候,一群兴奋的鸭子围了上来.

trans.tran_cn: （尤指少女或妇女的）一群，（鸟类的）一群
trans.tran_en: a large group of people of the same kind, especially girls or young women
